name: Lili's Search
description: Lili’s Search takes place in the beautiful city of Itaipava, where Grandma Matilda finds a very rare species of the plant Aurora. With her many tasks, Grandma Matilda asks her grandson to take care of the plant, with love and care. The main purpose of the game is to take care of Aurora, ensuring and monitoring their healthy growth. With simple gameplay and gorgeous narrative, the game offers so much peace and joy over the days.
